text:
System.Access: Granted
Welcome, Agent.
Your first task is to bypass the security layer.

> Decode the password: [ HACKTIV8 ]

Layer 1 Bypassed. Good.
Now, decrypt the communication frequency.
It's the language of the web, but for styling.

> What is it? [ _ _ _ ]

Frequency Decrypted. Impressive.
To gain full access, name the core technology that allows for interactive, component-based UIs.

> Identify the library: [ R_ _ _ _ ]

Mainframe connection established.
Every good agent saves their progress. What is the command to save your changes with a message in version control?

> Enter command: [ g__ / c_____ ]

Firewall is adapting. Quick!
Data is being transmitted in a lightweight format. It stands for 'JavaScript Object...' what?

> Complete the acronym: [ N_______ ]

They are trying to trace you!
They've set up a logic trap. Find the next number in the sequence.

1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, [ __ ]

Trace failed. You are a ghost.
Now, exploit their database. What is the name of the common attack that uses malicious SQL code to manipulate a backend database?

> Identify the attack vector: [ S__ / I________ ]

Database breached. We need their core data.
In React, what 'Hook' is used to manage state within a functional component?

> Name the hook: [ u__S____ ]

Almost there, Agent!
To disable their external defenses, you must understand how their systems communicate. What does the 'A' stand for in 'API'?

> Identify the term: [ A__________ ]

CORE ACCESS ACHIEVED.
They know we are here. There is only one thing left to do.
Execute the final command to disable the system safely.

> Final command: [ shutdown -h now ]
